Also to answer to some questions. The is NO difference between the two versions (EU, US). The only difference is on what Demo you have played. EU demos will load only on the EU edition and US on the US version. So there is not an actual difference besides this. Hope I help you :)
There are two uploads for the US version, this one and the Mexat one. Mexat's is 1.56gb. Why the drastic size difference?
cause this is compressed and the other one is not

@Nafis666
Did you already check the setting of your CPU Clock XMB and CPU Clock Game. Go to the recovery menu by pressing the SELECT button and see if the clock is set to "Default". Try also to set your on 333.
Check also the setting for UMD ISO MODE. Set the mode to SONY NP9660 or M33 driver...see which of the two modes can make the game run.

I hope this could help you.

sylvanalex, i don't think you need a password. that site doesn't require registration in the first place. also both links lead me directly to torrent downloads. most likely the speed is pain, but it's free afterall. Anyway, good luck downloading these.
